name: No Mayo Easy Pasta Salad
author: mhassler
summary: A friend of mine showed me how to make this. It's incredibly EASY and you'll have so many people asking for the recipe! This is also a great pasta salad if you're looking for something without mayo. Add or delete vegetables as you desire!
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; cook the rotini and tri-color rotini at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes; drain
Rinse the pasta with cold water until cool; drain
Combine pasta, tomatoes, cucumber, and purple onion in a large bowl
Stir ranch dressing and Italian-style salad dressing together in a separate bowl; spread over the pasta mixture and stir to coat
